name: Daddy Rush
description:
Help dad recover his music discs to become rich! -USE LEFT AND RIGHT TO MOVE- -YELLOW DISC: +Score- -BLUE DISC: +Speed-
 -BEER: -Speed and Score- 

I made this game for my father's birthday, starring him as the protagonist, have fun!

_______________________________________

This project was done in 2019, currently im working on Giggly's Park and other games like Far Beyond.
